text: William Terry "Bill" Valentine, Jr. (November 21, 1932 - April 26, 2015) was an American professional baseball umpire. He worked in the American League from 1963 to 1968. Valentine was an umpire in the 1965 Major League Baseball All-Star Game. In his career, he umpired 947 Major League games.Retrosheet Valentine died on April 26, 2015 in Little Rock, Arkansas, aged 82. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Sportspeople from Little Rock, Arkansas
title: Bill Valentine
